# Section 3: code sytax for neat looking pages ðŸ˜Ž

you can do inline code like so `sqrt(2)` then add the language prior to the line of code to get the result `r sqrt(2)`


**show the code, hide results**

```{r}
#| results: hide

data(mtcars)
cor(mtcars$mpg, mtcars$wt)
```

**show the results, hide the code**

```{r}
#| echo: false 

data(mtcars)
cor(mtcars$mpg, mtcars$wt)
```

# Section 4: plots

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
#| fig-height: 4
#| fig-width: 4
#| fig-align: center
mtcars %>%
    ggplot(aes(mpg, wt)) +
    geom_point(col="dodgerblue4", size=2)
```
